actions.message:
${tempVars("prefix")}play {song} - Play a song
${tempVars("prefix")}playlist {playlist link} - Play A Playlist
${tempVars("prefix")}stop - Stops the song
${tempVars("prefix")}pause - Pauses the song
${tempVars("prefix")}skip - Skips a song
${tempVars("prefix")}resume - Resumes the song
${tempVars("prefix")}connect - Summons the bot to your channel
${tempVars("prefix")}volume (0-100) - Sets the bot volume
${tempVars("prefix")}leave - Disconnects the bot from your channel
${tempVars("prefix")}clearqueue - Clears the queue
${tempVars("prefix")}nowplaying - Shows what the bot is playing
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
${tempVars("prefix")}botinfo - Shows the bot info
${tempVars("prefix")}whois - Shows your info
${tempVars("prefix")}serverinfo - Shows the server info
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
${tempVars("prefix")}purge {number} - Clears the requested amount of messages
${tempVars("prefix")}ban {user} - Bans a user
${tempVars("prefix")}kick {user} - Kicks a user
${tempVars("prefix")}mute {user} - Mute a user, Make sure there is a role called Muted
${tempVars("prefix")}unmute {user} - Unmute a user
${tempVars("prefix")}warn {user} - Warns a user, if a user is warned 3 times they are muted. (Make sure there is a role called Muted)
actions.name: Add Embed Field
